name: MobbWorld Game Studios Philippines
overview:
MobbWorld is a Philippine iPhone and Social Game Studio, that creates Real World Virtual Games, each game created by MobbWorld combines real world elements inside a game format making the experience of game playing more then just simple entertainment, but giving each player a sense they are part of the game. Each game takes place in a real world location, where players become immersed in the location and environment of the game, and unlike most games, players can come and visit the real world of the game and become part of the game itself.

MobbWorld’s first game due out in December 2009 is a mafia style role play game. Angeles City; which takes place in the real world town Angeles City Philippines, one of the last pure wild towns in the world

Angeles City is infamous for it’s bars and entertainment, with over 200 bars and 20,000 girls, it is a pure mafia type environment. this game is being released on the iPhone, Facebook and Twitter to start.

Players will start off as tourist to the town, experiencing all the city has to offer, the goal is to become a bar owner and to take over the town and become the King of Angeles

Combining real world events that go on in the city within a role-play game, players will interact directly with people in Angeles, and if they travel to Angeles they to will become part of the game.
